Title: A Tribute to the Dead
Description: All things must come to an end - even the life of a good man.  A family in Kun Lai has commissioned a monument for their beloved patriarch who has passed on recently.  Will you accept the commission?
ObjectivesText: Create an Inscribed Monument Stone and bring it to Inkmaster Jo Po at the Arboretum, in the Jade Forest. The recipe can be found in your Inscription pane under Quests.
